name: Yum Yum Animal
description:
Let's restore peace to the kingdom of lovely animals!

This is a strategic defense game that you have to protect the Kingdom from

a bunch of enemies.

With animal senses and strategic judgment,

Use limited points to place the animals in the field and grow them to win!

We invite you to a really hot summer battle!

Synopsis :

A peaceable and beautiful kingdom is....

A bunch of enemies are coming from far away.

Are you ready? You can do it, right? Let's go into the hot summer!

Gameplay : 

Strategic use of limited points by stage to place animals in the field and grow them.

* Food chain system

Animals form a food chain ecosystem.

When a higher-level animal meets a lower-level animal, it devours it.

Rabbit < Zebra < Black Panther < Lion < Elephant

* Level-up system

After you click Food, you can level up the animals placed in the field by clicking consecutively.

The helmet levels are classified into four levels.

No helmet < Bronze helmet < Silver helmet < Gold helmet

* Level First!

Animals with high-level helmet devour all animals with low-level helmet.

* Various items:

If you obtain items randomly dropped on the field, it will help you play the game.

- Can : Level up.

- Heart : The player's HP is restored when the character is acquired. Also, if the enemy eats, the enemy's HP will be restored.

Strategy is important. Maximize your strategy!

Game Features :

- Enjoy exciting play with animal senses and strategic judgment!

- Experience the fun of growing cute animals that are actively moving forward.

- It helps you play the game when you acquire a variety of items randomly dropped on the field. Use it strategically.

- Clear the stage repeatedly to meet the real ending!
